## isAnsiTerminator() function

Check if a character is an ANSI sequence terminator. Terminators are characters in the ranges A-Z (0x40-0x5a) and a-z (0x61-0x7a).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isAnsiTerminator(c: string): boolean;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

c


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Single character to check


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the character terminates an ANSI sequence
